# How did I create this blog?

This blog was created using the following stack:

* **Rmarkdown**: R markdown is very similar to markdown. Having previous experience with $\LaTeX{}$, this is an easy way to edit documents. Markdown is very used to document code so I thought it could be a good option.
* **R studio**: it is an IDE widely used to write R code. Since I created this blog to post my firts project done with R, I thought it would be a good idea to access all the content from "the same window". It also helps me get more familiar with working with the tool and with git (with github).
* **distill package**: An R package to make simple blogs.
